Lab 1.Title: Lab 1 - Portofolio Website
Lab 1.Description: Created a portofolio website for our group project Data Pulse.

Lab 2.Title: Lab 2 - Constitution Day Web App
Lab 2.Description: Created a website intended to educate readers about the contituion and its content.

Lab 3.Title: Lab 3 - JavaScript, AJAX, JSON, using APIs
Lab 3.Description: Created a web app with a weather API and another API of choice that displays Troy's current weather.

Lab 4.Title: Lab 4 - Generative AI
Lab 4.Description: Created the same website as in lab 3, but using only Gen AI to write all the code.

Lab 5.Title: Lab 5 - Bloomber Terminal
Lab 5.Description: Reflected on how to use the Bloomber Terminal, and how we could implement it into our project.

Lab 6.Title: Lab 6 - PHP, OOP and Input Handling
Lab 6.Description: Created a simple calculator using PHP and classes.
